eps.name: Summer Lovin
eps.desc: Haley learns about Andy's feelings for her, but doesn't interfere with Andy's proposal to Beth - leading her to get back together with Dylan. Alex, like so many college freshmen, finds herself in an interesting boyfriend situation and doesn't want to break up with him. Mitchell gets a mid-life crisis and begins to paint, freaking Cam out, leading Cam to try and find a job for Mitchell. Jay and Gloria looks at pre-schools for Joe, and Andy and Haley learn their feelings for each other but decides to not be together.

eps.name: The Day Alex Left for College
eps.desc: Alex leaves home for college earlier than Phil and Claire thought, leaving Haley in charge to give her some advice. Luke reluctantly agrees to assist Phil at an opening house day, rather than hang out with his friends. Claire, Jay, Joe, Manny and Gloria make-up an excuse in order to skip Lilly's soccer game. Mitch finds a new job in coaching his daughter's team with Cam's help.

eps.name: The Closet Case
eps.desc: Phil helps Haley convince Claire to allow Dylan to move in temporarily, but soon changes his mind after seeing how intimate living together means. Mitch takes on a much needed consulting job for Jay's biggest rival - Closets, Closets, Closets, Closets! Gloria and Cameron disagree on how to handle Manny's girl problem at school.

eps.name: She Crazy
eps.desc: Phil and Lily bond while building a habitation for ducks. Claire is nervous about pitching some ideas for Jay's closet company. Manny and Gloria have both crushes they help to speak and Cam befriends his new rents, a fraternity.

eps.name: The Verdict
eps.desc: Gloria has to participate in a jury duty while Jay struggles in order to put Joe in a good preschool. Phil tags along with Manny and Luke's class for a community service day, while "Take your daughter to work day" allows Claire to introduce her daughters to the professional world. Mitch and Cam both want to invite their respective friends to a party and ask Gloria for help.

eps.name: The More You Ignore Me
eps.desc: Phil and Claire begin to experience their teenagers's bad side when Luke gets arrested because he drives without a license while Alex sneaks out of a liquor store. Phil is really mad at Luke and he is considering punishing him as Judge and Jury. Cam helps Gloria to recreate and sell a hot sauce which comes from her family. Mitch tags along with Jay in order to make a good video to accompany his Award. Andy and Beth cross paths with Dylan and Haley at the movies.

eps.name: Phil's Sexy, Sexy House
eps.desc: Thanksgiving's here and Phil is helping Mitch and Cam's friend sell his sexy and sleek house. Each member gets the bright idea of spending some 'fun' time by sneaking into the new house; Unbeknownst to each other, they choose the same day and the same time, which leads to some hilarious confusion. Meanwhile at Jay and Gloria's, a surprise plan for the whole family turns into a disaster as Jay further surprises Gloria, who in turn, surprises him.

eps.name: Clean Out Your Junk Drawer
eps.desc: Gloria win a bid at the school auction for a family seminar with famed doctor and author Debra Radcliffe, who write a self-help book "Clean Out Your Junk Drawer". Gloria, Jay, Claire, Phil, Mitchell and Cam tries the seminar to get their emotional junk out, leading it to become a competition between the couples. Elsewhere, Haley and Alex meet up and counsel each other on their boy problems.

eps.name: White Christmas
eps.desc: Gloria rents a cabin in the mountains for the whole family to celebrate the holiday. However, unexpected incidents affects their holiday. Mitch and Cam are determined to make up for their bad caroling performance from last year. Haley and Andy can't keep their hands off each other, and Jay has a huge announcement to make that catches Claire off guard.

eps.name: Playdates
eps.desc: Claire must make Phil make the other couple on the dinner to pay as they never pay. Jay is surprised when the couple they have a playdate with appears to have a lot in common with them, including their age differences. Mitchell cash in a birthday coupon from Haley, Alex and Luke, so they scramble and host an impromptu tour of celebrity homes. Lily has her first crush.

eps.name: Spread Your Wings
eps.desc: Claire, Luke and Haley try to expel ducks while Phil visits Alex at Caltech. Jay and Mitch are in charge of Lilly's first sleep-over with her Vietnamiese troupe dance's fellows. Manny helps Gloria and Cam with their hot sauce project.

eps.name: Clean for a Day
eps.desc: Before taking over Jay's closet business, Claire decides to get the house in order with help from the family while Alex gets emotional after finding Sanjay's sweatshirt. Cam worries when Jay finds a new hobby piloting planes. Gloria is taught golf from Mitchell in order to connect with Jay.

eps.name: Thunk in the Trunk
eps.desc: Claire's new position means Phil feels like a housewife. Gloria's provocative sauce ad gets Jay jealous. Mitch and Cam rent the apartment above their own, but end up spying on their guests.

eps.name: The Storm
eps.desc: A thunder storm brings everyone to Jay and Gloria's where Jay tries his best to leave to meet his navy friends at a pub. Phil tries to be a hero and redeem himself from an embarrassing scene while Mitchell and Cam tries to salvage Lily's birthday party. Haley and Andy struggles with their relationship.

eps.name: I Don't Know How She Does It
eps.desc: Claire impresses her family when she has turned into a super-mom with both working and doing everything at home, leading to suspicion from Phil. Jay and Gloria goes to great lengths not to get caught with things they are doing, and Mitch and Cam are treated like second-class guests at their friends' wedding.

eps.name: The Cover-Up
eps.desc: Phil and Clarie try to hide innocent flirtations with a real estate client and yoga instructor from one another. Meanwhile, Jay's new hobby of starring in his own web-series, "Jay Talking," is met with criticism from an online troll. Elsewhere, Mitch and Cam attempt to teach Lily how to ride a bike, resulting in a broken arm and head injury for Cam.

eps.name: Express Yourself
eps.desc: After deciding to take a spontaneous trip to Paris, Phil and Claire stay up all night to adjust their bodies to the time change. Meanwhile, Cam’s scorned sister, Pam, comes to stay with the family, much to Mitchell’s chagrin. Elsewhere, Gloria and Manny find themselves in a predicament, when they inadvertently tamper with Jay’s remodel of the master bathroom.

eps.name: The Party
eps.desc: Manny and Luke babysit Lily so the adults in the family can have some fun, which includes Phil and Mitchell seeing a movie, Claire and Gloria going to a spa, and Jay and Cameron hitting a sports bar to watch a big fight, but Claire suspects the boys are going to throw a party.

eps.name: Man Shouldn't Lie
eps.desc: Claire and the kids hide a stray dog from Phil; even though Jay says he doesn't want new friends, Gloria invites a new couple over; Cameron rents out the upstairs apartment to a Christian rock band.

eps.name: Promposal
eps.desc: Claire is convinced there's a mole in the company; Phil confronts Auntie Alice about stealing Gloria's hot sauce recipe; Jay teaches Joe how to be a handyman.

eps.name: Crazy Train
eps.desc: Manny talks the family into taking the train to attend Dede's wedding; Claire and Mitchell work on a toast; Phil and Cam are excited to spot their favorite author on the train.

eps.name: Double Click
eps.desc: Claire struggles to find the right time to fire an employee; Phil thinks he caught Luke with a girl; Alex moves back in, seemingly undetected; Jay refuses to believe it might be difficult to reenter the workforce.
